buildCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f package.json ]; then npm install && npm run build; elif [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then cd frontend && npm install && npm run build; else echo "No package.json found" && exit 1; fi'
installCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f package.json ]; then npm install; elif [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then cd frontend && npm install; fi'
